alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 05 at 4:51PM CDT until August 05 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR WESTERN DESOTO AND SOUTHWESTERN SHELBY COUNTIES... At 451 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Walls, or near Horn Lake, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Southaven, Horn Lake, Hernando, Memphis, Walls, Lake Cormorant, Lynchburg, Whitehaven, Eudora, Robinson Gin, Newport, Trinity, Alden, Twin Lakes, Frees Corners, Nesbit, West Days, Lake View, Glover and Jago. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
